abort.no_filesystem_access:
This integration requires access to the local file system of your HomeAssistant installation to store a key for your FordPass™/The Lincoln Way™ account.

To do this, a subfolder will be created in the '.storage/' folder. However, this is currently not possible. An internal test failed. You can find details in the log of your Home Assistant instance.

Please ensure that you are running the Home Assistant installation with the correct user who has write access to the local file system.

If you are running Home Assistant in a Docker container, ensure that you are running the container with the correct user and that the container has access to the local file system.

Please check your installation and restart the setup of this integration once access to the local file system is possible.

token.title: Setup Token
token.description: The Token setup requires an external browser to get finally the access token.Details can be found https://github.com/marq24/ha-fordpass/blob/main/doc/OBTAINING_TOKEN.mdPlease follow the steps:1. Copy the URL below2. Open a Browser (with enabled developer tools) and paste the copied URL into your second browser3. Enter your FordPass™/The Lincoln Way™ credentials (again) and press the login button4. Watch the Network-tab till you see the `?code=` request5. Copy the full `Request-URL` from this request from the browsers developer tools and paste it in the Token field below6. Click OK to continue
